basic_info.description: My name is Emmanuel Sibanda, I am a Software Engineer with a prior career in Data Analytics, I worked at Google and co-founded an EdTech startup that raised close to $50 000, training and outsourcing Data Analytics talent in Africa. I realized that I spent most of my spare time building projects, this motivated my decision to transition to a Software Engineering career. FYI: Hover over Experience Header to see Qualifications
highlights: Founded an EdTech training Data Analytics talent in Africa raising $50 000
Worked at Google as an Analyst
Completed two bootcamps; Software Engineering & Data Science
Gained professional experience as a Software Engineer for a remote AI Biotech company in San Francisco

projects.title: Pair Programming Platform
projects.description: A pair programming matching pairs of users who are then redirected to a programming session where they can collaboratively solve a programming challenge using a shared code editor over an audio call. Browse through the images above to see a few of the features I built
projects.three_description: Synchronizing States to make paired users share code editor
projects.four_description: Blog: Building code editor and initiating Twilio Conference Call
projects.five_description: Matching and redirecting users to pair programming session
projects.six_description: Synchronizing States between two clients enabling users to share code editor
projects.seven_description: Retrieving programming challenge and synchronizing states, ensuring paired users see the same challenge

projects.title: Boxing Web Prediction App
projects.description: A web app using machine learning to predict the possible outcome of a boxing match for over 5000 boxers, using data scraped from multiple sources
projects.three_description: Blog Post: How I built a boxing prediction web app using Shiny
projects.four_description: How I built an Interactive Dashboard to visualize boxing data

projects.title: Evaluating the efficacy of marketing campaigns
projects.description: Built a data pipeline using Luigi automating the process of extracting and cleaning up data using SQL and building a Monte Carlo Markov Chain to evaluate the conversion rates of marketing campaigns by day, time and channel
projects.one_description: Blog Post explaining the process of this build

projects.title: Code Race
projects.description: An MVP for a gamified code editor helping users improve their coding skills by solving as many easy leetcode questions as they can within 25 minutes. For this project, I built a functional code editor, scraped and cleaned data from Leetcode, stored the data in a MongoDB database and built a custom auto-grader that checks whether the output produced by your code returns the correct answers.

projects.title: Job Assistant
projects.description: Using AI to give users a score out of 100 indicating their likelihood of securing an interview for a job.

projects.title: PEMDAS Calculator
projects.description: A simple PEMDAS calculator. Press any keys to interact directly with this app

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed an app automating form creation for clinical trial onboarding, reducing the time to create a clinical trial form from 30 minutes to 10 minutes with the initial version and refactored code to migrate all our form tables from ag-grid to react-data-grid, reducing our costs

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Built a startup and developed a curriculum training Data Science talent in Africa through live mentorship with experienced Data Scientists at no cost, recovering income through recruitment fees; Raised funding from two angel investors in Africa. Trained over 120 students with 50% securing internships and full time jobs

experience.title: Business Intelligent Analyst
experience.description: Built dashboards and used SQL to help evaluate the efficiency of marketing campaigns and aiding in fraud detection for over $55 million in monthly transactions

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Built dashboards collating data to help one of the big 5 Banks in South Africa  get insights to drive marketing efforts

experience.title: Analyst - Contractor
experience.description: Carried out data analysis on emerging tech ecosystems in Africa supporting Google branches in Africa in restructuring their strategic goal to increase revenue from Video ads

experience.title: Founder and Product Manager
experience.description: Co-founded a freelance marketplace platform that connected vetted freelance software developers and copywriters to clients seeking their services and managing each project to ensure completion. Managed projects such as; an SEO optimization campaign, refactoring code for US recycling company to modernize their infrastruture, building a mailing and billing system for a Game Reserve, increasing customer engagement by over 50% and building MVPs using Low-Code tools for startups as part of a contract with a seed investor/incubator

qualifications.studied: Selected as one of the 100 Brightest Young Minds in Africa by the BYM institution in collaboration with ABSA bank

qualifications.institution: University of Kwazulu Natal, South Africa
University of Kwazulu Natal, South Africa
